name: Mynd Analytics, Inc.
description: Mynd Analytics, Inc. is a leading healthcare technology company focused on transforming mental health through advanced data analytics and artificial intelligence. Founded in 2013, Mynd aims to enhance the quality of mental health care by providing innovative solutions that empower clinicians and improve patient outcomes. Their flagship product, Mynd Analytics, offers a comprehensive platform that integrates clinical data, patient-reported outcomes, and predictive analytics, enabling providers to make informed, evidence-based decisions. The company is dedicated to addressing the growing mental health crisis by leveraging technology to optimize treatment paths and improve access to care. In addition to their analytics platform, Mynd provides consulting services and collaborates with healthcare organizations to implement best practices in mental health management. With a mission to advance mental health care delivery, Mynd is committed to supporting the behavioral health community through innovation, collaboration, and a patient-centered approach.

seo.meta_title: Mynd Analytics, Inc. | Transforming Mental Health through Data Analytics
seo.meta_description: Discover Mynd Analytics, Inc., a leader in healthcare technology focused on improving mental health care delivery through advanced analytics and AI. Learn more about their innovative solutions.

faq.question: What does Mynd Analytics do?
faq.answer: Mynd Analytics provides advanced data analytics and AI solutions aimed at improving mental health care and patient outcomes.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Mynd Analytics?
faq.answer: Shawn P. McKinney is the CEO of Mynd Analytics, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Mynd Analytics headquartered?
faq.answer: Mynd Analytics is headquartered in Cypress, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What is Mynd's main product?
faq.answer: Mynd's main product is the Mynd Analytics Platform, which integrates clinical data and predictive analytics.
